content: stitch * around 84 large beds only round 15 * single_crochet in next 13 stitches 2 single_crochet in next stitch * around 90 round 16 * single_crochet in next 14 stitches 2 single_crochet in next stitch * around 96 round 17 single_crochet in back loops only around 72 84 96 round 18 single_crochet each stitch in both loops around for small beds repeat round 18 6 more times for medium beds repeat round 18 7 more times for large beds repeat round 18 8 more times last round cut and fasten_off the worsted weight yarn only continue with only the eyelash yarn single_crochet each stitch around 72 84 96 fasten_off and sew in ends copyright notice this pattern may be used for personal use only this pattern or any portion of the pattern may not be resold or otherwise used for profit without express permission from the designer
